patterns.pattern: [@ESTRING:rule_id:-A]@IN=@ESTRING:interface: @OUT= MAC=@LLADDR:mac_addr:18@ SRC=@IPv4:source.ip:@ DST=@IPv4:destination.ip:@ LEN=@NUMBER::@ TOS=@ESTRING:: @PREC=@ESTRING:: @TTL=@NUMBER:ttl:@ ID=@ESTRING:: @PROTO=@ESTRING:protocol: @TYPE=@ESTRING:: @CODE=@ESTRING:: @[SRC=@IPv4::@ DST=@IPv4::@ LEN=@ESTRING:: @TOS=@ESTRING:: @PREC=@ESTRING:: @TTL=@NUMBER::@ ID=@NUMBER::@ DF PROTO=@ESTRING:: @SPT=@NUMBER:source.port:@ DPT=@NUMBER:destination.port:@ LEN=@NUMBER::@ ]
